title: Girl In The Woods
description: Calista must accept one of the handsome noble suitors that have come to win her hand at the engagement party her parents have organized. During the evening, her previous feelings of despair, wanting more and not settling for a loveless marriage take over, making her feel trapped like a caged animal. She decides to escape into the woods, where she always finds peace and serenity. But what happens when she runs into a dark talking wolf named Conor, who promises that will guide her to what her heart desires the most? How can a wolf know what is hidden deep in her soul? Now she has to make a choice. Return back to her family and her predictable life? Or follow the wolfâ€™s unexplored and enchanting path?A BDSM Paranormal Fairytale Romance of 38.000 words.Adult Reading MaterialThe material in this story is for adult audiences only and contains graphic sexual content. It is intended only for those of age 18 and older.
author: Aileen Rose
